bill.summary:
PHEMCE Advisory Committee Act of 2023
This bill establishes an advisory committee for the Public Health Emergency Medical Countermeasures Enterprise (PHEMCE). (The PHEMCE identifies national health security needs and recommends related countermeasures and strategies to address those needs.)
The committee must support the PHEMCE by soliciting stakeholder input, coordinating with other government entities, helping to communicate decisions, and generally providing advice regarding the PHEMCE's duties.
